name: Finding Clara
description:
Clara has been missing for a month, and Sydney is determined to find her.  Play as Sydney as she searches for her girlfriend.


Credits

Created by Becca Miller
Music:  sedonoseterces by Hinterheim, used under Attribution 4.0 International License


Notes

This story is complete as-is, but I'll likely be expanding it once GMTK Game Jam 2020 is over.
